markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Initial Eidolon Ability](/Feats.aspx?ID=2955) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Summoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=96)

**Prerequisites**
[Summoner Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2953)

</column>

---

Your link to your [eidolon](/classes/summoner/eidolons) becomes stronger, granting it a new ability. Your eidolon gains the initial ability for an eidolon of its type.
name: Initial Eidolon Ability
